sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: ROSEN, NATIONAL TRIAL LAWYERS, Encourages Blue Owl Capital Inc. Investors to Secure Counsel Before Important Deadline in Securities Class Action - OWL
feed.summary: Rosen Law Firm is encouraging Blue Owl Capital Inc. (NYSE: OWL) investors to secure counsel before the February 2, 2026 lead plaintiff deadline in a securities class action lawsuit. The lawsuit alleges that Blue Owl made false and/or misleading statements and failed to disclose that it was experiencing significant pressure on its asset base from business development companies (BDC) redemptions, leading to undisclosed liquidity issues. Investors who purchased Blue Owl securities between February 6, 2025, and November 16, 2025, may be entitled to compensation.

feed.title: Pomerantz LLP Informs Shareholders of Class Action Filing Against Blue Owl Capital Inc. – OWL
feed.summary: Pomerantz LLP has announced a class action lawsuit against Blue Owl Capital Inc. (NYSE: OWL) on behalf of investors alleging securities fraud and unlawful business practices. The lawsuit details significant stock price drops following Blue Owl's Q3 2025 financial results, a proposed merger between two Blue Owl business development companies, and the subsequent termination of that merger. Investors who purchased Blue Owl securities during the Class Period have until February 2, 2025, to seek appointment as Lead Plaintiff.

feed.title: OWL DEADLINE ALERT: Blue Owl Capital Inc. Investors Urged to Contact Kirby McInerney LLP About Class Action Lawsuit
feed.summary: Kirby McInerney LLP reminds investors of Blue Owl Capital Inc. (NYSE: OWL) about the February 2, 2026 deadline to become a lead plaintiff in a federal securities class action lawsuit. The lawsuit alleges that Blue Owl failed to disclose significant pressure on its asset base from business development company (BDC) redemptions and undisclosed liquidity issues, leading to stock price declines following multiple negative news events. Investors who purchased Blue Owl securities between February 6, 2025, and November 16, 2025, are affected and encouraged to contact the firm.

feed.title: Blue Owl Capital Inc. (OWL) Investors Who Lost Money Have Opportunity to Lead Securities Fraud Lawsuit
authors: Law Offices of Howard G. Smith

The lawsuit alleges that Blue Owl failed to disclose significant pressure on its asset base from BDC redemptions, resulting in undisclosed liquidity issues and a likely halt to redemptions of certain BDCs. Investors who suffered losses between February 6, 2025, and November 16, 2025, have until February 2, 2026, to contact the law firm to participate.
